author: mattmann
msg: Fix for NUTCH-871 MoreIndexingFilter missing date format

author: nick
msg: Fix bug #49694 - Use DataFormatter when autosizing columns, to better match the real display width of formatted cells

author: jfthomps
msg: added installnic to kernel cmdline parameters so that the private nic can be configured in the xcat tables on a per node basis instead of having it hard coded in initrd.img and rootimg.gz

author: rjung
msg: Allow glob patterns in the jarsToSkip configuration and add
some debug logging to the jar scanner.
Still need to localize debug log messages.
ecj Jar in catalina.properties now uses a glob,
did not yet add globs to all the commons jars

author: artagnon
msg: (test_list): Mark the skeleton_load and copy_and_modify_load tests
as Wimp only for ra_dav; they've been fixed for ra_svn in r981876.
